title: Moist rhubarb cake
ingredients: ['50g butter, softened', '300g dark brown soft sugar', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '300g plain flour', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '250ml soured cream', '500g chopped rhubarb', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg']
